Name: Elder Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered lemon slice wheel and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry (sail).
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
DRY SHAKE (without ice) to emulsify and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish with skewered lemon slice and cherry (sail).
Review: So smooth that it's almost fluffy. A slightly sweet after-dinner cocktail.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly in London, England. See: History of the Sours family .
Nutrition: One serving of Elder Sour contains 160 calories
